articles.content:
Staff members of foreign embassies help Korean farmers 
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Janchivdorjyn Lombo, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, and embassy officials helped farmers of the Korea-Mongolia Friendship Jongbang Cooperative Farm in rice-transplanting on June 10.
 The guests handed aid materials to the farm.    
 Meanwhile, staff members of the Cambodian embassy helped farmers of the Korea-Cambodia Friendship Paeksok Cooperative Farm in farming on June 9.

Greetings to prime minister and foreign minister of Russia
articles.content:
Greetings to prime minister and foreign minister of Russia
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of greetings to his Russian counterpart Mikhail Mikhailovich Kasyanov on the occasion of Russia's National Day.
 The message expressed belief that the DPRK-Russia relations, the ties of economic cooperation between the two countries in particular, would grow stronger on the basis of the new legal foundation and on the principle of mutual benefit and sincerely wished him great success in his work for the economic development of the country.    
 Meanwhile, Paek Nam Sun, minister of foreign affairs, sent a message of greetings to his Russian counterpart Igor Sergeyevich Ivanov on the same occasion.

Greetings to Philippine President
articles.content:
Greetings to Philippine President
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Philippine President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo today on the occasion of the 104th anniversary of its National Day.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields, the message sincerely wished the president greater success in her responsible work for the prosperity of the country.
